message: but the default convore.com search engine is not very efficient so I included this google custom search that returns urls starting with https://convore.com/kynetx
install the app from : http://apps.kynetx.com/installable_apps/4284-KynConvore
the save button will always be visible
Kynetx convore group gets indexed very quickly by google, that's cool
the save button becomes Save'n'Deploy
this is quite useful when you have lot's of appbuilder tabs open
First one is : KynConvore
KynConvore adds a right column on convore.com with a Google Custom search field inside an iframe.
in the future I will put a radio button so the search can also include selected websites, documentations , blogs that talk about KRL and Kynetx technology
I am traveling soon back to France so I thought I'd share some of my work before I leave . They are working but not completely polished.
screenshot http://skitch.com/ciol/fryd3/kynetx-convore
the editor will open automatically in full screen mode
this is still useful for KBX on Firefox which doesn't have the Dev/Production feature supported like on Chrome
The second app is called Appbuilder Extended
Appbuilder Extended adds little features that are useful while working with the kynetx appbuilder ( appbuilder.kynetx.com )
The idea is to have all those apps included in a "Kynetx Dev Suite"
which will be released with SuiteFramework
screenshot : http://skitch.com/ciol/frymg/screenshots-settings-kynetx-kynconvore-appbuilder-extended
send me a tweet @loicdevaux and I'll share the apps with you in the appbuilder
that's all folks!
this means that when you save with a click or ctrl+s the source gets saved and deployed in one step
appbuilder extended will also make the app name you are editing always visible
get it here : http://apps.kynetx.com/installable_apps/4273-Appbuilder_Extended
both apps can have their features activated/disactivated
this can be achieved with a right click which shows a mouse menu
Any developer is really welcome to fork those apps and add features
awesome work @loic
